name: Rotten Circuits (v.0.1)
description:
Humans are a thing of the past...

Rotten Circuits is a 2D Top-Down Shooter with soulslike elements. You are a robot in a mysterious world, fighting on the frontlines.

Using two guns at the same time, you can find unique weapon combinations to outsmart your enemies. Your only protection is an energy shield and your only way to heal is at Memory Upload Stations.

THIS IS JUST A DEMO!

This is the very first demo of this game, featuring only a simplified version of the first zone. I'm mainly uploading this to do playtests, but I hope to release the full-version on steam one day. The two main features that haven't made it in this demo are a bigger focus on the narrative and a more interconnected open world. Follow me for updates if you want :)

CREDITS:

This is mostly a one-man project, but Conin is contributing with great additional art.

For Music & Sound I used a lot of online assets. All are linked here:
